title: Delete component template properties
content:
To delete component template properties, perform the following steps:

  1. In the left pane of the Sequenced Components area, select the component palette that contains the component type whose template properties you want to delete.
  2. Click the component type whose template properties you want to delete.
  3. Select the Templates tab.
  4. In the templates list, click the template whose properties you want to delete.
  5. Click the gear icon for the property and select Delete.
  6. Click Yes in the confirmation dialog.

Note that you can't delete these component template properties: locked properties (indicated by the Lock icon) or inherited properties.
